text: Abdoul Mbaye (Dakar, April 13, 1953) is a Senegalese politician.Premier ministre: Macky Sall choisi Abdoul Mbaye, un technocrate Mbaye studied at the Cheikh-Anta-Diop University, HEC Paris and the University of Paris I Pantheon- Sorbonne.Habib Mbaye (MBA.01) : itinéraire d’un candidat à la présidentielle After finishing his studies, he worked at the Central Bank of West Africa from 1976. Mbaye had been Prime Minister of Senegal under President Macky Sall since 5 April 2012, succeeding Souleymane Ndéné Ndiaye. He was released on September 1, 2013.SÉNÉGAL. Un ancien banquier comme Premier ministre ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Senegal Category:Alumni of HEC Paris
title: Abdoul Mbaye
